paper_abstract: Developable surface and line of curvature play an important role in geometric design and surface analysis. This paper proposes a new method to construct a developable surface possessing a given curve as the line of curvature of it. We analyze the necessary and sufficient conditions when the resulting developable surface is a cylinder, cone or tangent surface. Finally, we illustrate the convenience and efficiency of this method by some representative examples. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An approach for designing a developable surface through a given line of curvature
